definitions.body: make light of (As. zalâlu, be in ruins, COT:Gloss (Asrn:Standard Inscr. 15), Ar. d-al=a = Aram. dal (rare), dliylo0 easy; but [[זְלַל]], zal, are more common (all intrans.))—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: only Pt. act. [[זוֹלֵל]] De 21:20 + 2 t.; [[זוֹלֵלָָה]] La 1:11; pl. [[זוֹלְלִים]] Pr 28:7, cstr. [[זׁלְלֵי]] Pr 23:20—
be worthless, insignificant Je 15:19 (opp. [[יׇקָר]]) La 1:11 (of Jerusalem in distress).
trans. make light of = be lavish with, squander (cf. II. [[זוּל]]), esp. of gluttony [[בשׂר]] ´[[ז]] Pr 23:20 (‖[[סׂבְאֵי יַיִן]]), abs. v:Pr 23:21, De 21:20 (both ‖[[סׂבֵא]]), Pr 28:7.

definitions.title: Qal 1
definitions.body: make light of, despise (opp. [[כִּבֵּד]]); on form cf. Ges:§ 67, R. 8 RobGes, MV SS (> assigned to [[זוּל]] by Thes Kö:Lgb. i. 471).
